definitions: A generative artificial intelligence model developed by Luma AI that creates realistic and stylized videos from text prompts, images, or other videos.
A tool for video generation that allows users to produce high-quality, cinematic-grade footage with advanced control over style and content.
examples: The artist used Luma Dream Machine to animate their concept art.
Luma Dream Machine is quickly becoming a favorite among indie filmmakers.
Generating a short film with Luma Dream Machine took only a few minutes.
